s2.message: Regression fixed: list of blockable elements empty when going back to a page

s4.message: Fixed up abp: protocol implementation (caused Firefox windows to hang when opening if menu bar was hidden by Adblock Plus)

s5.message: Fixed: object tab text displayed vertically in Japanese due to wrapping

s6.message: Added moz-icon: protocol scheme to the whitelist to fix issues with FireFTP (forum thread)

s7.message: Made Filter and State columns in the list of blockable items visible by default and increased width of the Type column

s8.message: Blockable items will now be shown even for whitelisted sites if Adblock Plus is globally disabled

s9.message: Made sure that width of the blockable items list is remembered (in case it was turned into a sidebar using CSS)

s10.message: Increased default value for extensions. adblockplus. subscriptions_fallbackerrors to 50

s11.message: Adblock Plus should now work with Pocket K-Meleon

s12.message: K-Meleon: Size and position of Adblock Plus windows are now saved and restored when the window is reopened

s13.message: K-Meleon: Fixed abp: URLs for adding subscriptions with two clicks
